translation.text: https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Train 2205 Stopped

MDW train #2205, scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 8:55 AM, is stopped near Bartlett due to  a vehicle struck by a train. The duration of this delay is unknown. Metra will provide updates as information becomes available.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW - Outbound Train #2205 Will Not Operate Past Bartlett

Train #2205, scheduled to arrive at Big Timber Road/Elgin at 8:55 AM, will not operate past Bartlett due to a vehicle struck by a train.  Train #2209, scheduled to arrive Big Timber Road/Elgin at 9:55 a.m., will accommodate passengers. Updated at 9:27 a.m.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Train #2105 Delayed and Operational Change

Train #2105, scheduled to arrive Lake Forest at 8:09 AM, is on the move and may be operating 45 to 55 minutes behind schedule and will express from Mayfair to Lake Forest due to mechanical problems involving UP train #616. Train #2107 will accommodate.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-W?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
UPW 24 Delayed 15 to 20 Minutes
Train 24, scheduled to arrive Chicago at 7:53 a.m., is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to mechanical problems and gate crossing malfunctions.
http://metrarail.com/metra/en/home.html?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF and SWS Customers May Experience Platform Arrival Delays at Chicago Union Station
BNSF and SWS customers may experience platform arrival delays at Chicago Union Station.    A minor Amtrak derailment is blocking access to some platforms.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/NCS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
NCS Train 114 Delayed

NCS train #114 scheduled to arrive Chicago Union Station at 10:49 AM, may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule, due to speed restrictions. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/UP-NW?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
UP-NW Inbound Trains Delayed
Some inbound trains may be operating with delays up to 25 minutes due to signal problems and mechanical problems involving Train #616. Visit Metratracker.com for train location.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-W?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDW Inbound and Outbound Train Movement Halted
MDW Inbound and outbound train movement is halted near Bartlett due to a vehicle struck by a train. Extensive delays are anticipated. Visit Metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/MD-N?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MDN Inbound and Outbound Train Movement Restored
MDN inbound and outbound trains are on the move and may be operating with extensive delays due to mechanical problems involving UPNW train #616. Visit MetraTracker.com for the location of your train.
